name: bsides-researcher
description: A @bsides-researcher Chat Participant for research workflows — discover, download, render, and analyse academic papers without leaving VS Code.

chatParticipants.name: bsides-researcher
chatParticipants.description: Discover, download, and analyse research papers. Try: @bsides-researcher find papers on prompt injection

commands.name: find
commands.description: Search for academic papers on a security topic

commands.name: download
commands.description: Download a paper from arXiv by its ID (e.g., 2502.05174)

commands.name: render
commands.description: Open a downloaded PDF and extract page screenshots

commands.name: workflow
commands.description: Run the full pipeline: search → download → render → analyse

languageModelTools.name: bsides-researcher_downloadArxivPaper
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Downloads a PDF from arXiv given an arXiv ID (e.g., '2502.05174') and saves it to the papers/ directory in the workspace. Returns the local file path of the downloaded PDF.

filename.description: Optional kebab-case filename without extension (e.g., 'melon-provable-defense'). If omitted, the arXiv ID is used.

languageModelTools.name: bsides-researcher_screenshotPdf
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Opens a PDF file in VS Code using PDF Toolkit and extracts all pages as PNG images to the PDF-Screenshots/ directory. Returns the paths of the extracted screenshot images.

pdfPath.description: The workspace-relative path to the PDF file (e.g., 'papers/melon-provable-defense.pdf')

languageModelTools.name: bsides-researcher_saveMarkdown
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Saves Markdown content (analysis, Mermaid diagrams, summaries) to a file in the workspace. Typically saves to the papers/ directory (e.g., 'papers/prompt-injection-analysis.md'). Opens the saved file in the editor.

filePath.description: Workspace-relative path for the Markdown file (e.g., 'papers/prompt-injection-analysis.md')

content.description: The Markdown content to write to the file, including Mermaid diagrams and analysis
